review: I love Amazon fire stick. Although I feel that the GUI could be improved. I am only able to see a few things at a time. For instance the number of shows tiled in the GUI are not that many. The tiles are big and doesn't allow for many titles to be viewed at once. I don't have a 'you may also like' showing by default, unless I choose this option. Sometimes 1 extra click is 1 too many. :)The functionality is pretty awesome. Fantastic hardware. But the GUI could be improved. Please consider it a constructive criticism.Thanks for developing a great product. Keep it up.
author: Lakshmi Balaramane
